subproject.corporate outcome: Livelihoods and economic recovery generated, including infrastructure restoration, employment and sustainable income earning opportunities for crisis affected communities
subproject.description: This project intends to strengthen UNDP's support to national level policy formulation, dialogue and consensus-building on DDR in Sri Lanka. The project will provide a platform for UNDP's engagement in DDR issues in Sri Lanka, specifically through the placement of short-term technical capacities within the Country Office, to provide substantive inputs to guide the national policy formulation process as well as guide UNDP's future involvement in the area. The project will also support activities aimed at building awareness and facilitating dialogue and consensus on DDR in Sri Lanka.
subproject.gender code: No noticeable contribution to gender equality
subproject.title: Strengthening UNDP's Technical
